location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to the Government, Bombay to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that Captain Lichfield has been granted permission, from the Governor of Bombay, to draw credit from the Bushire Residency in order to purchase horses for service with the Bombay Cavalry.
